inclusion.criterion: coinfection for more than 6 months before the screening visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: stable permissible HAART regimen for more than 8 weeks before Day 1 without switches
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: CD4 count of ≥500 cells/mm3 and a HIV-1 and/or HIV-2 viral load ≤50,000 copies/mL at screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have evidence of HCV infection genotype 1 (molecular assay)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Is infected or coinfected with HCV of another genotype than genotype 1
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Has a contraindication to the administration of Peg-IFN-alfa or RBV, or medical history or laboratory values that preclude treatment with Peg-IFN-alfa or RBV according to the respective local prescribing information
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have any contraindication to the currently prescribed HAART regimen at screening
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive human leukocyte antigen (HLA)-B5701 genotyping result at screening (or documented result prior to screening) if abacavir is a component of HAART
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months. His medical records show previous positive HCV RNA tests and a positive enzyme immunoassay for anti-HCV-antibodies.
